.. tags:: constructive-, python, declaration, class

ConstructiveDilemmaDeclaration (python class)
========================================================================

.. seealso::
   :ref:`math concept<constructive__math_inference_rule>` | :ref:`python inclusion class<constructive__inclusion_python_class>` | :ref:`python sample<constructive__python_sample>`

This section presents the :python:`ConstructiveDilemmaDeclaration` python class.

This class models the :ref:`declaration<object_declaration_math_concept>` of the :ref:`constructive-<constructive__math_inference_rule>` :ref:`inference-rule<inference_rule_math_concept>` in the target :ref:`universe-of-discourse<universe_of_discourse_math_concept>`.

*Punctilious* users do not need to instanciate objects from this class. In effect, the :python:`UniverseOfDiscourse` class exposes the :python:`constructive_` property, and instanciation is automatic when the property is accessed for the first time.

.. module:: punctilious
   :noindex:
.. autoclass:: ConstructiveDilemmaDeclaration
   :members:
